video.title: Comics Without Borders
video.synopsis: Hosted by comedian Russell Peters, this series spotlights comics from around the globe, including Ahmed Ahmed, Angelo Tsarouchas and B-Phlat.

episodes.synopsis: Justin Worsham riffs on obsessive parents and puking babies, and Dean Edwards brings the funny with the merits of being old.
episodes.title: Justin Worsham and Dean Edwards

episodes.synopsis: Comedians Mike E. Winfield and Shane Mauss address everything from buying bad bootleg movies to singing ridiculous songs in the shower.
episodes.title: Mike E. Winfield and Shane Mauss

episodes.synopsis: K-von and Sebastian Maniscalco riff on on everything from body waxing and slow check-out lines to the ridiculousness of the movie 300.
episodes.title: K-Von and Sebastian Maniscalco

episodes.synopsis: Tapan Trivedi discusses the difference between Indians and Pakistanis, and Angelo Tsarouchas describes the plight of being a world-traveling fat man.
episodes.title: Tapan Trivedi and Angelo Tsarouchas

episodes.synopsis: B-Phlat and Darren Carter joke about body image, Snoop Dogg, white-guy rappers, and how hard it is for black women to exercise.
episodes.title: B-Phlat and Darren Carter

episodes.synopsis: Erik Griffin and Ahmed Ahmed riff on everything from multi-racial British people to sharing the same name as a noted terrorist.
episodes.title: Erik Griffin and Ahmed Ahmed

episodes.synopsis: Edwin San Juan discusses the finer points of being Filipino, and Bret Ernst riffs on what it's like to serve different races in a restaurant.
episodes.title: Edwin San Juan and Bret Ernst

episodes.synopsis: Comedians Felipe Esparza and Sam Tripoli joke about everything from hood speech patterns to women being tough in the movies.
episodes.title: Felipe Esparza and Sam Tripoli

episodes.synopsis: Yoshi Obayashi and Kristeen Von Hagen riff on everything from wearing thong underwear to being named after a little green dinosaur.
episodes.title: Yoshi Obayashi and Kristeen Von Hagen
